amendment.description: Amendment requires the President to direct the U.S. Permanent Representative to make every effort to establish a Democracy Fund at the United Nations to be administered by Member States of the United Nations Democracy Caucus.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in part 2 of House Report 109-132 to call for the establishment of a democracy fund to assist countries that respect and uphold human rights and are determined by the Secretary of State to be emerging democracies or democracies in transition. Fund would be administered by the U.S. and other members of the U.N. Democracy Caucus.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ros-Lehtinen amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
